headline: Revolutionary User Interfaces
text: The human computer interface helps to define computing at any one time. As computers have become more mainstream the interfaces have become more intimate. This is the journey of computer technology and how it has come to touch all of our lives.

asset.caption: From punch cards to multi touch

headline: Color Walk
text: At the end of the afternoon, the colors hung in our brains and eyes. We walked away seeing a world brimming over with colors: the rusty orange of a rooftop water tower in the sun, a bright blue mohawk, and the humble yellowy greens of a new leaf all jumped into our eyes.

asset.caption: This lovely woman was happy to let us take a picture of her scarf, but she told us it would "look better on someone else." We, of course, disagree.
